00063 struct block_header
00064 {
00065     typedef detail::atomic_count count_type;
00066 
00067 #ifndef BOOST_DISABLE_THREADS
00068         mutex mutex_;
00069 #endif
00070 
00071     count_type count_;                                                          
00072     block_header * redir_;                                                      
00074         bool destroy_;                                                                  
00075     intrusive_list::node tag_;                                          
00077     intrusive_list includes_;                                           
00078     intrusive_list elements_;                                           
00080     static fast_pool_allocator<block_header> pool_;
00086     block_header() : count_(1), redir_(this), destroy_(false)
00087     {
00088         includes_.push_back(& tag_);
00089     }
00090         
00091         
00098     bool release()
00099     {
00100         block_header * p = redir();
00101 
00102         if (-- p->count_ == 0)
00103         {
00104                         p->destroy_ = true;
00105             for (intrusive_list::iterator<block_base, & block_base::block_tag_> i; i = p->elements_.begin(), i != p->elements_.end(); )
00106                 delete &* i;
00107                         p->destroy_ = false;
00108             
00109             for (intrusive_list::iterator<block_header, & block_header::tag_> i = p->includes_.begin(), j; j = i, i != p->includes_.end(); i = j)
00110                         { 
00111                                 ++ j;
00112                 if (&* i != this && &* i != p)
00113                     delete &* i;
00114                         }
00115                     
00116             if (p != this)
00117                 delete p;
00118 
00119             return true;
00120         }
00121 
00122         return false;
00123     }
00124 
00125         
00132     block_header * redir() const
00133     {
00134         block_header * p = redir_;
00135         
00136         while (p != p->redir_)
00137                 p = p->redir_;
00138         
00139         return p;
00140     }
00141         
00142         
00149     void redir(block_header * p)
00150     {
00151         block_header * q = p->redir();
00152         
00153         if (redir_ != q)
00154         {
00155 #ifndef BOOST_DISABLE_THREADS
00156                 mutex::scoped_lock scoped_lock(mutex_);
00157 #endif
00158             redir_ = q;
00159             redir_->includes_.merge(includes_);
00160             redir_->elements_.merge(elements_);
00161             new (& redir_->count_) count_type(redir_->count_ + count_); 
00162         }
00163     }
00164 
00165         
00173     void * operator new (size_t s)
00174     {
00175         return pool_.allocate(s);
00176     }
00177     
00178         
00187     void * operator new (size_t s, block_header * p)
00188     {
00189         return p;
00190     }
00191 
00192         
00199     void operator delete (void * p)
00200     {
00201         pool_.deallocate(static_cast<block_header *>(p), sizeof(block_header));
00202     }
00203 };

00209 #define TEMPLATE_DECL(z, n, text) BOOST_PP_COMMA_IF(n) typename T ## n
00210 #define ARGUMENT_DECL(z, n, text) BOOST_PP_COMMA_IF(n) T ## n const & t ## n
00211 #define PARAMETER_DECL(z, n, text) BOOST_PP_COMMA_IF(n) t ## n
00212 
00213 #define BEFRIEND_MAKE_BLOCK(z, n, text)                                                                                                                                                         \
00214         template <typename V, BOOST_PP_REPEAT(n, TEMPLATE_DECL, 0)>                                                                                                 \
00215                 friend block_ptr<V> text(BOOST_PP_REPEAT(n, ARGUMENT_DECL, 0));
00216 
00217 #define CONSTRUCT_MAKE_BLOCK(z, n, text)                                                                                                                                                            \
00218         template <typename V, BOOST_PP_REPEAT(n, TEMPLATE_DECL, 0)>                                                                                                 \
00219                 block_ptr<V> text(BOOST_PP_REPEAT(n, ARGUMENT_DECL, 0))                                                                                                                 \
00220                 {                                                                                                                                                                                                                               \
00221                         return block_ptr<V>(new block<V>(BOOST_PP_REPEAT(n, PARAMETER_DECL, 0)));                                                                       \
00222                 }

00231 template <typename T>
00232     class block_ptr : public block_ptr_base<T>
00233     {
00234         template <typename> friend class block_ptr;
00235 
00236         typedef block_ptr_base<T> base;
00237         
00238         using base::share;
00239                 using base::po_;
00240 
00241         union
00242         {
00243             block_header * ps_;                                         
00244             intrusive_stack::node pn_;                          
00245         };
00246 
00253         template <typename V>
00254             block_ptr(block<V> * p) : base(p)
00255             {
00256                 if (! block_base::pool_.is_from(this))
00257                 {
00258                     ps_ = new block_header();
00259 
00260                     init(p);
00261                 }
00262                 else
00263                 {
00264                     block_base::pool_.top(this)->ptrs_.push(& pn_);
00265                     block_base::pool_.top(this)->inits_.merge(p->inits_);
00266                 }
00267             }
00268 
00269                 
00276         template <typename V>
00277             block_ptr & operator = (block<V> * p)
00278             {
00279                 release(false);
00280 
00281                 init(p);
00282 
00283                 base::operator = (p);
00284 
00285                 return * this;
00286             }
00287             
00288                 template <typename V>
00289                         friend block_ptr<V> make_block();
00290 
00291                 BOOST_PP_REPEAT_FROM_TO(1, 10, BEFRIEND_MAKE_BLOCK, make_block)
00292 
00293     public:
00294         typedef T                       value_type;
00295         typedef block<value_type>     element_type;
00296 
00297 
00302         block_ptr() : ps_(0)
00303         {
00304             if (! block_base::pool_.is_from(this))
00305                 ps_ = new block_header();
00306             else
00307                 block_base::pool_.top(this)->ptrs_.push(& pn_);
00308         }
00309 
00310                 
00317         template <typename V>
00318             block_ptr(block_ptr<V> const & p) : base(p)
00319             {
00320                 if (! block_base::pool_.is_from(this))
00321                     ps_ = new block_header();
00322                 else
00323                     block_base::pool_.top(this)->ptrs_.push(& pn_);
00324 
00325                 ps_->redir(p.ps_);
00326             }
00327 
00328                 
00335                         block_ptr(block_ptr<T> const & p) : base(p)
00336             {
00337                 if (! block_base::pool_.is_from(this))
00338                     ps_ = new block_header();
00339                 else
00340                     block_base::pool_.top(this)->ptrs_.push(& pn_);
00341                                 
00342                 ps_->redir(p.ps_);
00343             }

00345 
00352         template <typename V>
00353             block_ptr & operator = (block_ptr<V> const & p)
00354             {
00355                 if (ps_->redir() != p.ps_->redir())
00356                 {
00357                     release(false);
00358                                         
00359                     ps_->redir(p.ps_);
00360                 }
00361                 base::operator = (p);
00362 
00363                 return * this;
00364             }
00365 
00366 
00373             block_ptr & operator = (block_ptr<T> const & p)
00374             {
00375                 return operator = <T>(p);
00376             }
00377 
00378         void reset()
00379         {
00380             release(false);
00381         }
00382         
00383         bool cyclic() const
00384         {
00385                 return ps_->redir()->destroy_;
00386         }
00387 
00388         ~block_ptr()
00389         {
00390                         if (cyclic())
00391                                 base::po_ = 0;
00392                         else
00393                                 release(true);
00394         }
00395 
00396 #if defined(BOOST_HAS_RVALUE_REFS)
00397         block_ptr(block_ptr<T> && p): base(std::move(p.po_)), ps_(std::move(p.ps_))
00398         {
00399         }
00400 
00401         template<class Y>
00402                 block_ptr(block_ptr<Y> && p): base(std::move(p.po_)), ps_(std::move(p.ps_))
00403                 {
00404                 }
00405 
00406         block_ptr<T> & operator = (block_ptr<T> && p)
00407         {
00408                 po_ = std::move(p.po_);
00409                 ps_ = std::move(p.ps_);
00410                 
00411                 return *this;
00412         }
00413 
00414         template<class Y>
00415                 block_ptr & operator = (block_ptr<Y> && p)
00416                 {
00417                         po_ = std::move(p.po_);
00418                         ps_ = std::move(p.ps_);
00419                         
00420                         return *this;
00421                 }
00422 #endif

00424     private:
00431         void release(bool d)
00432         {
00433             base::reset();
00434             
00435             if (! block_base::pool_.is_from(this))
00436                 if (ps_->release())
00437                     if (! d)
00438                         new (ps_) block_header();
00439                     else
00440                         delete ps_;
00441                 else 
00442                                         if (! d)
00443                         ps_ = new block_header();
00444         }
00445 
00446                 
00453         void init(block_base * p)
00454         {
00455             if (p->init_)
00456                 return;
00457 
00458                         // iterate memory blocks
00459             for (intrusive_list::iterator<block_base, & block_base::init_tag_> i = p->inits_.begin(); i != p->inits_.end(); ++ i)
00460             {
00461                 i->init_ = true;
00462                 ps_->redir()->elements_.push_back(& i->block_tag_);
00463 
00464                                 // iterate block_ptr elements
00465                 for (intrusive_stack::iterator<block_ptr, & block_ptr::pn_> j = i->ptrs_.begin(), k; k = j, j != i->ptrs_.end(); j = k)
00466                                 {
00467                                         ++ k;
00468                     j->ps_ = ps_;
00469                                 }
00470             }
00471         }
00472     };

00474 template <typename V>
00475         block_ptr<V> make_block()
00476         {
00477                 return block_ptr<V>(new block<V>());
00478         }
